# trailingSwipeActionsConfigurationProvider

**Instance Property**

The closure that provides the set of actions to display when swiping on the trailing edge of the cell.

## Declaration

```swift
var trailingSwipeActionsConfigurationProvider: UICollectionLayoutListConfiguration.SwipeActionsConfigurationProvider? { get set }
```

## Customizing swipe actions

- **leadingSwipeActionsConfigurationProvider**: The closure that provides the set of actions to display when swiping on the leading edge of the cell.
- **UICollectionLayoutListConfiguration.SwipeActionsConfigurationProvider**: A closure that configures the swipe actions for a cell.
